fields.description: In the myapp/build/iphone/Resources directory contains default startup images and plist files. This directory is unneeded as these files can just be copied to or created in the actually app build directory.

comments.body:
The error -
Error connecting to debugger: Error Domain=NSPOSIXErrorDomain Code=61 "The operation couldn’t be completed. Connection refused"
is not coming now with new build.So closing this issue as its fixed with TIMOB 12313.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.0.2.v20130207164659
Titanium  Studio:3.0.2.201301251115
